about_the_game:
The protagonist of this game is a middle school student who doesn't like learning and only sleeps at school every day. She also has two friends who don't like learning like her, one is a boy who thinks he's right but enjoys playing with his friends; The other is a bear who is slow witted but enjoys playing first person shooter games. She doesn't care about these two insignificant friends, just wants to stay at home and play computer games. But she didn't know that behind this seemingly peaceful life, there was an astonishing truth hidden.

This game has no gameplay, only basic operations such as movement and dialogue. The play time is approximately 40 minutes. The game has a built-in editor that can be used to customize the game's chapters, plot, interaction, and gameplay. The current content in the game is created using the built-in editor. The method to open the editor is to press the R key 5 times continuously during the game, but it is not recommended to use it when the game has not been cleared, as you may see the plot behind the game and be exposed.

The protagonist of this game is a middle school student who doesn't like learning and only sleeps at school every day. She also has two friends who don't like learning like her, one is a boy who thinks he's right but enjoys playing with his friends; The other is a bear who is slow witted but enjoys playing first person shooter games. She doesn't care about these two insignificant friends, just wants to stay at home and play computer games. But she didn't know that behind this seemingly peaceful life, there was an astonishing truth hidden.

This game has no gameplay, only basic operations such as movement and dialogue. The play time is approximately 40 minutes. The game has a built-in editor that can be used to customize the game's chapters, plot, interaction, and gameplay. The current content in the game is created using the built-in editor. The method to open the editor is to press the R key 5 times continuously during the game, but it is not recommended to use it when the game has not been cleared, as you may see the plot behind the game and be exposed.
name: 莎比编辑器 SUBE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i7-13700
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 4070ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: In this game, you will play a junior high school student who doesn't like learning, and all you have to do every day is go to school, finish school, and sleep.
